description: Move AgentView to components/, create a demo slide with skills scenario, and move How Skills Work slide into deck for side-by-side comparison

key_decisions.rationale: Agent walkthroughs are niche and complex - they don't fit a simple variable-based template pattern.
Both slides in the deck using the same skills story, different visual approaches.
Make AgentView a first-class Slidev component alongside FileTree, Terminal, etc.
Same PDF extraction story as How Skills Work, enabling direct visual comparison.
User hasn't seen AgentView rendered yet - layout decisions deferred.

high_level: Get AgentView working as a Slidev slide to evaluate rendered output
Enable direct visual comparison between AgentView and manual HTML scene approaches
Provide reference implementation for future agent walkthrough slides
mid_level: Create agent walkthrough demo slide with skills/PDF extraction events
Move How Skills Work slide from to_add/ into slides/
Ensure both slides render correctly in Slidev
